Product Description

1971 Original Columbia Pictures Pressbook for the film ' J.W.Coop ' starring Cliff Robertson and Geraldine Page.

This Pressbook is in VG+++ condition and measures 17" x 11". It has 6 pages which fold out. It had once been folded but has been led flat for a very long time. It also has very light creasing.

Nice pressbook.

Pressbooks were made for every film from 1910 through to the 1970s.

Pressbooks can contain pictures of the posters, articles, advertisements and lots more information about the film.

Note that pressbooks can have single sided pages, if it has double sided pages that is classed as 2 pages.

I Grade my Pressbooks very strictly. My 'good' grade will be comparable to others ' Very Good' grade.

Excellent: A great pressbook in near perfect condition

Fine: A pressbook with the tiniest of defects. A fantastic display piece.

VG-Fine: A great pressbook for the most avid collector, may have tiny edge wear, the odd border pinhole, or very light but not noticeable creasing.

Very Good: This pressbook has survived in pretty nice condition,it may have tiny defects within the image which aren't distracting or defects on the blank borders which wont show when displayed

Good: This pressbook may have some imperfections,like small tears or 'clean' tears or tape bleeds and light staining

Fair: This pressbook has significant imperfections which will be largely noticeable and distracting but its possible a talented restorer could rectify these faults

Pressbooks will be placed in a plastic sleeve and shipped between many pieces of sturdy cardboard.

We combine your purchases to save you money !

* if you purchase a rolled item and a flat item ( lobby cards & film stills ) this will incur Two shipping charges. If you buy 20 lobby cards you will pay one shipping charge at the shipping cost above, this is also the same if you buy 20 rolled posters.

Please check back or bookmark the store as i have thousands of rare posters and lobby cards to list.

Thanks for looking.

Delivery & Returns

UK deliveries will be shipped within one working day. All EU and worldwide deliveries will be shipped within three working days. If, for any reason at all you are not happy with the item, then please ship it back to us within 14 days and we will give you a refund. For more information please see our Terms and Conditions.
